description.p: Added new recipe â€” Imitation crab sticks salad
Removed meat based fillings from my Piroshki recipe because I feel I don't like them as much and they take too long to make.
Redid my RSS feed a bit! Nothing major but, if you want to see changes, you can unsubscribe and resubscribe and don't forget to clear your reader's cache!

Also, I converted all my recipe files to Markdown and I love it so much more than working with HTML because it's so much more readable, but that's besides the point and doesn't really matter for the end user (you!).

item.title: Website update #4
item.description: Fixed a ton of minor grammatical errors and typos. Google docs and VSCode LTeX+ to the rescue!

item.title: Finnish blueberry pie - Mustikkapiirakka
item.description: Finnish blueberry pie a.k.a. mustikkapiirakka, made with fresh or frozen blueberries, cream and mixed rye flour.

item.title: Website update #3
item.description: Published a new recipe - Finnish blueberry pie. Also made some changes to the website's CSS style sheet to make it easier to maintain and cleaned up some messy code. Additionally, I rewrote some bits of my zucchini pancakes recipe, nothing major or significant though. Aaand some other minor technical fixes here and there...

item.title: Website update #2
item.description: Implemented some minor improvements and fixes for the website. All external links now open in a new browser window. Adding to this, also changed the 88x31 button's code that was meant for embedding so that when a user clicks on it, it opens the link in a new window as well.

item.title: "Simple Recipes" website was created today!
item.description: This website was created on November 20th, 2024, hurray! It's built purely with HTML and CSS and with the help of HUGO website generator. Happy cooking and website making everyone!!!
